summary: This adds various new creature followers, including, Dragon Priest, Falmer Shadowmaster, Hagraven, Skeleton, Spriggan Matron, Spriggan, Werewolf, Young Giant.
descriptionHtml:
This adds various new creature followers, including, Dragon Priest, Falmer Shadowmaster, Hagraven, Skeleton, Spriggan Matron, Spriggan, Werewolf, Young Giant.
These take up the normal follower slots, so you can\'t have the Hagraven and Lydia for example.
They do have sort of lame voices like the Skeleton has a Nord voice but I had to do that to make them work properly.Their stats and equipment are all they same I did not change anything except their level, which is level 65.They can all be found in the Four Shields Tavern in DragonBridge.
Incase you were wondering, my werewolf is white because of a texture mod. Yours will not be that color unless you also have that mod.

UPDATE*
This makes the follower level to the scale of the player(I thought they were to strong).
MUST DELETE OLD FILES BEFORE DOWNLOADING!!!

Hope you like it Download, endorse and comment!


Check out my other mods please:
NEW FOLLOWERS-Argonian_Nord_Khajit   
NEW SPELLS-Conjure Drakes
NEW SPELLS-Conjure Ice Wraith_Magic Anomaly
Sorry I don\'t have links just search the titles listed above:)
author: CHEIMON
